description: A man aged in his 50s was pronounced dead in the early hours of the morning, police say.
title: Cambridge murder inquiry: Man arrested over reports of stabbing
title_page: Cambridge murder inquiry: Man arrested over reports of stabbing - BBC News
maintext:
A murder investigation has been launched over the death of a man in his 50s.
Police were called to Chesterton Road in north Cambridge at about 01:00 GMT after receiving reports of a stabbing.
A 30-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of murder.
Det Insp Mark Butler said: "I understand this is likely to be concerning to the local community, but we believe it to be an isolated incident and we have extra patrols in the area."
